scripts.deploy:ZkEVM:localhost: rm -f .openzeppelin/unknown-31337.json && node deployment/1_createGenesis.js && npx hardhat run deployment/2_deployPolygonZKEVMDeployer.js --network localhost && npx hardhat run deployment/3_deployContracts.js --network localhost
